attributes.action: have new boundaries drawn up so that no more than 500 members get elected to the House of Commons.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When we only have 500 MPs each will be paid enough to compensate for forgoing other things and to cover the spending they need to do the job and Britain will need no more Fees Office.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
